page.title: 04Transport Continued
page.content: {Trams}came in 1905.They were very popular and ran from{Summit}to{ {Rochdale}until 1929. Today many people in our area have got their own cars.There are regular{ {bus services }as well-which, like the trams, run from Summit to Rochdale.We also have a service which runs from Rochdale to our other neighbouring town of{Todmorden.}The route through Summit is a {Trans-Pennine}route, as is the one that crosses the South East of our area to {Halifax}. Transport is interesting in our valley-over the years the three main types have all played their part in the life and development of our area. Overhead we now hear the sound of the fourth way to travel-the aeroplanes destined for Manchester and Leeds.
